text: Tickets purchased directly from Singapore Airlines can be canceled online.
label: Cancel Trip

text: Refunds depend on fare type (refundable fares get full/partial refund; non-refundable only taxes refunded).
label: Cancel Trip

text: Tickets for flights to/from USA can be canceled penalty-free within 24 hours if booked 7 days prior.
label: Cancel Trip

text: Cancellation fees and deadlines apply as per fare terms.
label: Cancel Trip

text: Fare types like Lite do not allow cancellations (only taxes refunded).
label: Cancellation Policy

text: Other fares are cancellable with fees.
label: Cancellation Policy

text: Full refunds are given if SIA cancels the flight or significant schedule changes occur.
label: Cancellation Policy

text: Travel insurance may cover other reasons for cancellation.
label: Cancellation Policy

text: Economy/Premium Economy: 1 carry-on bag, max 7 kg, dimensions up to 115 cm total (L+W+H).
label: Carry On Luggage FAQ

text: Business/First/Suites: 2 carry-on bags, combined max weight 14 kg, each up to 115 cm total dimensions.
label: Carry On Luggage FAQ

text: One personal item allowed separately (e.g. handbag, laptop).
label: Carry On Luggage FAQ

text: Flight changes allowed subject to fare conditions and fees.
label: Change Flight

text: Flexibility varies by fare type and route.
label: Change Flight

text: Refunds may be partially available depending on fare rules.
label: Change Flight

text: Baggage allowance depends on class and destination:
label: Check In Luggage FAQ

text: Complaints can be made online or via hotline for issues like delays, cancellations, baggage mishandling.
label: Complaints

text: Compensation possible for eligible claims under route-specific regulations.
label: Complaints

text: Keep all documentation for complaint processing.
label: Complaints

text: Report damage immediately at airport or within 7 days online if last flight operated by SIA.
label: Damaged Bag

text: Liability limited by Conditions of Carriage and international conventions.
label: Damaged Bag

text: No liability for normal wear and tear.
label: Damaged Bag

text: Limited promotions such as tax-free prices or KrisFlyer mile discounts apply periodically.
label: Discounts

text: Promo codes usually apply only on SIA website with conditions.
label: Discounts

text: Fare rules specify refund and change conditions, vary by fare type (e.g. Lite, Value, Standard, Flexi).
label: Fare Check

text: Fare details are available at booking.
label: Fare Check

text: Flight status updates available online via SingaporeAir website or app.
label: Flight Status

text: Comprehensive flight info, schedule changes, and cancellations are handled per policy on official site.
label: Flights Info

text: Travel insurance recommendations provided to cover cancellations and lost baggage.
label: Insurance

text: Some credit cards offer automatic travel insurance.
label: Insurance

text: Flight changes or cancellations possible for medical emergencies with supporting documents.
label: Medical Policy

text: Priority assistance for last-minute changes due to medical reasons.
label: Medical Policy

text: Report missing bags online or at airport Lost & Found within 7 days.
label: Missing Bag

text: Reference number provided to track claim status.
label: Missing Bag

text: Pet travel policies exist but details vary; generally require advance notice and compliance with regulations.
label: Pet Travel

text: Standard airline prohibitions apply on dangerous goods, sharp objects, flammable materials, etc.
label: Prohibited Items FAQ

text: Seat selection and availability depend on fare type and booking class.
label: Seat Availability

text: Transport of sports and music equipment allowed with advance notice; may incur extra fees.
label: Sports Music Gear
